availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Crawford, Jr. (Monroe County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Monroe County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James Crawford, Sr. Married to Jane Pinkley Crawford. Father of James Crawford, William Crawford, S. W. Crawford, S. S. Crawford, and James B. Crawford. Farmer in Monroe County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Monroe County, p. 391A-391B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Monroe County, p. 18.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Monroe County, Precinct 4 p. 1.
Find A Grave, "James ‘Big Jim’ Crawford (1808-1888)," Memorial #26940324, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/26940324# (accessed December 21, 2018).
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records on Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #7016165, All Counties Deaths, p. 3249.
